biotools.summary: Hidden Markov Model based tool that is developed to detect histone modification in cancer ChIP-seq data. It applies three correction steps to the data: copy number correction, GC bias correction and noise level correction.

bioschemas.name: HMCan
bioschemas.summary: Hidden Markov Model based tool that is developed to detect histone modification in cancer ChIP-seq data. It applies three correction steps to the data: copy number correction, GC bias correction and noise level correction.
